tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SupplyChainData (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer_name VARCHAR(255),
    batch_number VARCHAR(50),
    serial_number VARCHAR(50),
    expiration_date DATE,
    production_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    blockchain_hash TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain_pharmaceuticals (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    manufacturing_date DATE NOT NULL,
    expiry_date DATE NOT NULL,
    batch_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain_medical_devices (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    device_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    manufacturing_date DATE NOT NULL,
    serial_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain_transactions ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    transaction_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    product_id INT NOT NULL, 
    sender_id INT NOT NULL, 
    receiver_id INT NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE pharmaceuticals (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name VARCHAR(255),
   manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
   production_date DATE,
   expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE medical_devices (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name VARCHAR(255),
   manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
   type VARCHAR(100),
   serial_number VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   product_id INT,
   location VARCHAR(255),
   timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE pharmaceuticals (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    batch_number TEXT NOT NULL,
    manufacturer TEXT NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE medical_devices (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    serial_number TEXT NOT NULL,
    manufacturer TEXT NOT NULL,
    release_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE tracking_history (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    batch_id INTEGER REFERENCES pharmaceuticals(id),
    device_id INTEGER REFERENCES medical_devices(id),
    transaction_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id UUID NOT NULL,
    block_number INTEGER NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    transaction_data JSONB
);
